Text.Name: God_Xiuwei
Text.Desc: Sit quietly while converting your accumulated Belief into Cultivation.

Text.Name: God_Xiuwei1
Text.Desc: Sit quietly while converting your accumulated Belief into Cultivation, but with a rather low conversion rate.

Text.Name: God_Xiuwei2
Text.Desc: Sit quietly while converting your accumulated Belief into Cultivation, but with a slightly low conversion rate.

Text.Name: God_XinZhai
Text.Desc: Enter Mind Fasting, which gradually reduce the impact of emotions on your Mood, and continues for a period of time after completion. The length of time the effect persists after its completion is equivalent to the time you spent in Mind Fasting.

Text.Name: God_ResurrectionA
Text.Desc: Resurrects a dying or dead character. You receive 10 Divinity.
Text.TargetDesc: Select a dead or dying character.

Text.Name: God_ResurrectionB
Text.Desc: Resurrects all dying and fallen character on your side within the scene. You receive 100 Divinity.

Text.Name: God_DefuseZhinian
Text.Desc: Resolve an Obsession for the character, and obtain an Obsession Gem.
Text.TargetDesc: Select a character whose Obsession has already manifested.

Text.Name: God_GodLike
Text.Desc: Cast a spell to temporarily raise your Divinity to extreme. However, each usage will permanently increase your Divinity by 1.

Text.Name: God_BeliveMe
Text.Desc: Persuade ally or neutral Inner disciple characters to try to convert them into Core Followers.
Text.TargetDesc: Select a character that needs persuasion.

Text.Name: God_Jingxin
Text.Desc: Release on a non-Shendao cultivating character and reduce its Mood multiplier by 25%, lasting 7 days.
Text.TargetDesc: Select a non-Shendao character to release on.

Text.Name: God_ProductUp1
Text.Desc: Increase the base material output of your god-possessed area by 100% within 10 days.

Text.Name: God_ProductUp2
Text.Desc: Increase the base material output of your god-possessed area by 200% within 4 days.

Text.Name: God_ProductUp3
Text.Desc: Increase the base material output of your god-possessed area by 500% within 1 day.

Text.Name: God_TongLing_Plant
Text.Desc: Plants are alive but have no mercy. To illuminate a plant needs 1 Humanity as primer. Costs 9 Obsession Gems and 1 Primordial Soul Gem to try to illuminate its psychic power. The illumination result will need some time to appear. The plant cannot be illuminated with psychic power again while in an illumination session. The higher the spell caster's divinity, and the more times the plant has been illuminated, the easier it is for the item to be illuminated successfully.
